@Janus22 perhaps I didn't properly convey the artists afterword but he implied something along the line of the two got together only after quenching their desires using each other. Meaning their relationship is thin as a one night stand, if anything happens they for sure will split. So the mc saying I will never cheat on you with that much conviction over a finicky relationship is totally ironic.

The ending felt really ominous, but considering the author afterword, it probably was just a feeling, as the ironic he means is for the fact that both of them got together after being cheated by, to which they swear never to do it with each other. Couple that with him saying he likes good endings more, and it isn't some deeper meaning about the couple not being together.
Anyway, good stuff. Not the most amazing art, but satisfying and pretty one,  with some good poses.
